mapper.sql: ID, NAME, CACULATE_TYPE, FEE, FEE_RATE, LEFTRANGE, RIGHTRANGE, MIN_FEE, MAX_FEE, SUB_TYPE, CANMODIFY,CANDELETE, DESCRIPTION, PROCESS_PROGRAM, PROCESS_PARM_VAL, PRICING_CRITERIA_ID, PARM2, PARM1, T_SRV_PRICE_RULE_ID, PARM3, PARM4, PARM5, COUPON_RATE, ACTIVE, VERSION_NO, PRICING_VALUATION_ID, DEPT_REGION_ID,CREATE_TIME,MODIFY_TIME,WEIGHT_LEFT_RANGE,WEIGHT_RIGHT_RANGE, VOLUME_LEFT_RANGE,VOLUME_RIGHT_RANGE,IS_PICK_UP

MASTER.ID, MASTER.NAME, MASTER.CACULATE_TYPE, MASTER.FEE, FEE_RATE, MASTER.LEFTRANGE, MASTER.RIGHTRANGE, MASTER.MIN_FEE, MASTER.MAX_FEE, MASTER.SUB_TYPE, MASTER.CANMODIFY, MASTER.CANDELETE, MASTER.DESCRIPTION, MASTER.PROCESS_PROGRAM, MASTER.PROCESS_PARM_VAL, MASTER.PRICING_CRITERIA_ID, MASTER.T_SRV_PRICE_RULE_ID, MASTER.PARM2, MASTER.PARM1, MASTER.PARM3, MASTER.PARM4, MASTER.PARM5, MASTER.COUPON_RATE, MASTER.ACTIVE, MASTER.VERSION_NO, MASTER.PRICING_VALUATION_ID, MASTER.DEPT_REGION_ID

MASTER.ID AS ID , MASTER.NAME AS NAME , MASTER.CACULATE_TYPE AS CACULATE_TYPE , MASTER.FEE/100 AS FEE , MASTER.FEE_RATE AS FEE_RATE , MASTER.LEFTRANGE AS LEFTRANGE , MASTER.RIGHTRANGE AS RIGHTRANGE , MASTER.MIN_FEE/100 AS MIN_FEE , MASTER.MAX_FEE/100 AS MAX_FEE , MASTER.SUB_TYPE AS SUB_TYPE , MASTER.CANMODIFY AS CANMODIFY , MASTER.CANDELETE AS CANDELETE , MASTER.DESCRIPTION AS DESCRIPTION , MASTER.PROCESS_PROGRAM AS PROCESS_PROGRAM , MASTER.PROCESS_PARM_VAL AS PROCESS_PARM_VAL , MASTER.PRICING_CRITERIA_ID AS PRICING_CRITERIA_ID , MASTER.PARM2 AS PARM2 , MASTER.PARM1 AS PARM1 , MASTER.T_SRV_PRICE_RULE_ID AS T_SRV_PRICE_RULE_ID , MASTER.PARM3 AS PARM3 , MASTER.PARM4 AS PARM4 , MASTER.PARM5 AS PARM5 , MASTER.COUPON_RATE AS COUPON_RATE , MASTER.ACTIVE AS ACTIVE , MASTER.VERSION_NO AS VERSION_NO , MASTER.PRICING_VALUATION_ID AS PRICING_VALUATION_ID , MASTER.DEPT_REGION_ID AS DEPT_REGION_ID , MIN_FEE_RATE , MAX_FEE_RATE , MASTER.COMB_BILL_TYPE_CODE
mapper.update:
update /*综合-价格-修改计价方式明细*/ PKP.T_SRV_PRICING_CRITERIA_DETAIL
NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CACULATE_TYPE = #{caculateType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FEE = #{fee,jdbcType=DECIMAL}*100,
FEE_RATE = #{feeRate,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
LEFTRANGE = #{leftrange,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
RIGHTRANGE = #{rightrange,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
MIN_FEE = #{minFee,jdbcType=DECIMAL}*100,
MAX_FEE = #{maxFee,jdbcType=DECIMAL}*100,
SUB_TYPE = #{subType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CANMODIFY = #{canmodify,jdbcType=CHAR},
CANDELETE = #{candelete,jdbcType=CHAR},
DESCRIPTION = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PROCESS_PROGRAM = #{processProgram,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PROCESS_PARM_VAL = #{processParmVal,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PRICING_CRITERIA_ID = #{pricingCriteriaId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PARM2 = #{parm2,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
PARM1 = #{parm1,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
T_SRV_PRICE_RULE_ID = #{tSrvPriceRuleId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PARM3 = #{parm3,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
PARM4 = #{parm4,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
PARM5 = #{parm5,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
COUPON_RATE = #{couponRate,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ACTIVE = #{active,jdbcType=CHAR},
VERSION_NO = #{versionNo,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
DEPT_REGION_ID = #{deptRegionId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MIN_FEE_RATE = #{minFeeRate,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
MAX_FEE_RATE = #{maxFeeRate,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CREATE_TIME=#{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
MODIFY_TIME=#{modifyDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
COMB_BILL_TYPE_CODE=#{combBillTypeCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where PRICING_VALUATION_ID = #{pricingValuationId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select:
select /*综合-价格-按照计费规则ID查询计价方式明细*/
from PKP.T_SRV_PRICING_CRITERIA_DETAIL MASTER LEFT JOIN PKP.T_SRV_PRICING_VALUATION VALUATION ON MASTER.PRICING_VALUATION_ID = VALUATION.ID where VALUATION.ID = #{valuationId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert: INSERT /*综合-价格-复制汽运价格方案 插入计价方式明细*/ INTO PKP.T_SRV_PRICING_CRITERIA_DETAIL (ID, NAME, CACULATE_TYPE, FEE, FEE_RATE, LEFTRANGE, RIGHTRANGE, MIN_FEE, MAX_FEE, SUB_TYPE, CANMODIFY, CANDELETE, DESCRIPTION, PROCESS_PROGRAM, PROCESS_PARM_VAL, PRICING_CRITERIA_ID, PARM2, PARM1, T_SRV_PRICE_RULE_ID, PARM3, PARM4, PARM5, COUPON_RATE, ACTIVE, VERSION_NO, PRICING_VALUATION_ID, DEPT_REGION_ID, MIN_FEE_RATE, MAX_FEE_RATE) SELECT SYS_GUID(), MASTER.NAME, MASTER.CACULATE_TYPE, MASTER.FEE, MASTER.FEE_RATE, MASTER.LEFTRANGE, MASTER.RIGHTRANGE, MASTER.MIN_FEE, MASTER.MAX_FEE, MASTER.SUB_TYPE, MASTER.CANMODIFY, MASTER.CANDELETE, MASTER.DESCRIPTION, MASTER.PROCESS_PROGRAM, MASTER.PROCESS_PARM_VAL, MASTER.PRICING_CRITERIA_ID, MASTER.PARM2, MASTER.PARM1, MASTER.T_SRV_PRICE_RULE_ID, MASTER.PARM3, MASTER.PARM4, MASTER.PARM5, MASTER.COUPON_RATE, MASTER.ACTIVE, MASTER.VERSION_NO, #{pricingValuationId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MASTER.DEPT_REGION_ID, MASTER.MIN_FEE_RATE, MASTER.MAX_FEE_RATE FROM PKP.T_SRV_PRICING_CRITERIA_DETAIL MASTER LEFT JOIN PKP.T_SRV_PRICING_VALUATION VALUATION ON MASTER.PRICING_VALUATION_ID = VALUATION.ID WHERE VALUATION.ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

insert /*综合-降价发券-插入计价方式明细*/ into BSE.T_BAS_COUPON_DETAIL
ID,
NAME,
CACULATE_TYPE,
FEE,
FEE_RATE,
LEFTRANGE,
RIGHTRANGE,
MIN_FEE,
MAX_FEE,
SUB_TYPE,
CANMODIFY,
CANDELETE,
DESCRIPTION,
PROCESS_PROGRAM,
PROCESS_PARM_VAL,
PRICING_CRITERIA_ID,
PARM2,
PARM1,
T_SRV_PRICE_RULE_ID,
PARM3,
PARM4,
PARM5,
COUPON_RATE,
ACTIVE,
VERSION_NO,
PRICING_VALUATION_ID,
DEPT_REGION_ID,
MIN_FEE_RATE,
MAX_FEE_RATE,
CREATE_TIME,
MODIFY_TIME,
COMB_BILL_TYPE_CODE,
WEIGHT_LEFT_RANGE,
WEIGHT_RIGHT_RANGE,
VOLUME_LEFT_RANGE,
VOLUME_RIGHT_RANGE,
IS_PICK_UP,
IS_VOID

'N'
mapper.update:
update /*综合-降价发券-修改计价方式明细*/ BSE.T_BAS_COUPON_DETAIL
NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CACULATE_TYPE = #{caculateType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FEE = #{fee,jdbcType=DECIMAL}*100,
FEE_RATE = #{feeRate,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
LEFTRANGE = #{leftrange,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
RIGHTRANGE = #{rightrange,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
MIN_FEE = #{minFee,jdbcType=DECIMAL}*100,
MAX_FEE = #{maxFee,jdbcType=DECIMAL}*100,
SUB_TYPE = #{subType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CANMODIFY = #{canmodify,jdbcType=CHAR},
CANDELETE = #{candelete,jdbcType=CHAR},
DESCRIPTION = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PROCESS_PROGRAM = #{processProgram,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PROCESS_PARM_VAL = #{processParmVal,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PRICING_CRITERIA_ID = #{pricingCriteriaId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PARM2 = #{parm2,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
PARM1 = #{parm1,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
T_SRV_PRICE_RULE_ID = #{tSrvPriceRuleId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PARM3 = #{parm3,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
PARM4 = #{parm4,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
PARM5 = #{parm5,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
COUPON_RATE = #{couponRate,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ACTIVE = #{active,jdbcType=CHAR},
VERSION_NO = #{versionNo,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
PRICING_VALUATION_ID = #{pricingValuationId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DEPT_REGION_ID = #{deptRegionId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MIN_FEE_RATE = #{minFeeRate,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
MAX_FEE_RATE = #{maxFeeRate,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CREATE_TIME=#{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
MODIFY_TIME=#{modifyDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
COMB_BILL_TYPE_CODE=#{combBillTypeCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WEIGHT_LEFT_RANGE=#{weightLeftRange,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
WEIGHT_RIGHT_RANGE=#{weightRightRange,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
VOLUME_LEFT_RANGE=#{volumeLeftRange,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
VOLUME_RIGHT_RANGE=#{volumeRightRange,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
IS_PICK_UP=#{isPickUp,jdbcType=CHAR},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert:
insert /*综合-降价发券-插入计价方式明细*/ into BSE.T_BAS_COUPON_DETAIL
ID,
NAME,
CACULATE_TYPE,
FEE,
FEE_RATE,
LEFTRANGE,
RIGHTRANGE,
MIN_FEE,
MAX_FEE,
SUB_TYPE,

PARM2,

PARM3,

COUPON_RATE,
ACTIVE,
VERSION_NO,
PRICING_VALUATION_ID,

COMB_BILL_TYPE_CODE,
WEIGHT_LEFT_RANGE,
WEIGHT_RIGHT_RANGE,
VOLUME_LEFT_RANGE,
VOLUME_RIGHT_RANGE,
IS_PICK_UP,
IS_VOID

mapper.delete: UPDATE /*综合-降价发券-根据ID删除计价方式明细*/ BSE.T_BAS_COUPON_DETAIL T SET T.IS_VOID ='Y' WHERE T.PRICING_VALUATION_ID = #{priceValuationId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
